timeline.message: Update the pulsar connector docs to keep up with API changes.
Document the scenario that Pulsar connector does not support fast-fail.

timeline.bodyText: To have it aligned with timestamps in following example output it should be 10:38:44.504  Between 10:32:00:00-10:32:30:000 Pulsar got 508 messages from user4.
timeline.author: olukas
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -384,8 +375,8 @@ If `MessagePublisher` was running while you were following these steps,
 you'll now get a report on the whole history of the events and then a
 steady stream of real-time updates.
 
-Sample output:
-Between 12:44:30:000 - 12:45:30:000 Pulsar got 522 messages from user4.
+Sample output: 12:44:30:030 Between 12:44:30:000 - 12:45:30:000 Pulsar

timeline.bodyText: This should be aligned also with gradle file. Please change in gradle file compile 'com.hazelcast.jet-contrib:pulsar:0.1-SNAPSHOT' to compile 'com.hazelcast.jet-contrib:pulsar:0.2-SNAPSHOT'
timeline.author: olukas

replies.bodyText: I reverted both to 0.1-SNAPSHOT, since it will be the first release (also, I made related changes in the main PR).
replies.author: ufukyilmaz

timeline.message: Fix the version of the connector in the example
Align the timestamps of the sample output.
